detectors.description:
Infura.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#27-103) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 400000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#29)
detectors.markdown:
[Infura.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L27-L103) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [initialSupply = 400000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L29)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#17)
	- Infura.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#37-39)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Infura.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#43-45)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#18)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Infura.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#47-49)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#19)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Infura.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#87-91)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#21)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#22)
	- Infura.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#56-69)

validate(uint8) should be declared external:
	- Infura.validate(uint8) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#51-54)
